response.overview: Featuring almost 100 minutes of filmed unadulterated interviews, press conferences and other occasions of interest with Foo Fighters, during which Dave Grohl and his merry men come over with their traditional decency, humility and non-rock star approach to both their lives and their art, while discussing all manner of topics close to their communal and individual hearts. Providing a fascinating document of the band's hopes, wishes and concerns, and coming 'straight from the horse's mouth', if you will, there is no doubt that the revelations here are the real thing - untarnished by an often bitter, petty and 'trying-to-be hip' music media.
response.title: Foo Fighters - Under The Spotlight
